installed_languages.markdownDescription: Run `TreeSitter: Install Language` to see supported languages

python_path.markdownDescription: Path to Python 3.8 executable, required for building languages `.so` files

pip_path.markdownDescription: Required for installing `tree_sitter` bindings, inferred from `python_path` if left blank

language_name_to_scopes.markdownDescription: Override or extend which languages apply to which Sublime Text scopes, see [src/utils.py](https://github.com/sublime-treesitter/TreeSitter/blob/main/src/utils.py)

language_name_to_repo.markdownDescription: Override or extend lookup dict with Tree-sitter grammar repos, see [src/utils.py](https://github.com/sublime-treesitter/TreeSitter/blob/main/src/utils.py)

language_name_to_parser_path.markdownDescription: Overrides for special Tree-sitter grammar repos in which `parser.c` isn't at `src/parser.c`, see [src/utils.py](https://github.com/sublime-treesitter/TreeSitter/blob/main/src/utils.py)

language_name_to_debounce_ms.markdownDescription: Debounce parsing for parsers that are slow

debug.markdownDescription: Enable debug logging and assertions; has non-zero performance cost, for developers only
